name: FreeQry
description:
Created for My First Game Jam: Summer 2021
Keyboard or gamepad to move. Hold space or (A) to interact.
Free the chickens, flee from the guard dogs!

Code and assets were done by me. All feedback is welcome :)

My goals for this jam was to create a game with:
- pixel perfect camera
- basic enemy behavior 
- gamepad support

What I would add if I had the time:
- more levels
- some additional mechanics
